step1Desc: Select your chicks and quantity on our website. No initial payment required.
step2Desc: Our management contacts you within seconds to confirm your order.
step3Desc: We confirm you are a serious buyer and ready for your order.
step4Desc: Your chicks are assigned to the nearest agent close to your location.
step5Desc: Receive your chicks, pay at the agent point, and start rearing immediately.
heroTitle: Buy Chicks. Rear Them. Sell Back. Make Profit.
heroSubtitle: Start small. Grow fast. We sell healthy day-old chicks. You rear them. We buy them back at a good price. No stress. No market struggle.
problemTitle: Many people rear chicken very well...
problemDesc: They buy feed, treat sickness, and take care day and night. But when birds mature, they don't know where to sell fast. Buyers delay, prices are low, and the market is stressful. That is the problem we solve.
solutionDesc: We provide healthy strong chicks, quality feed guidance, and proper tools. We guide you step-by-step and buy back your mature birds. You are not alone.
challengesSubtitle: And our easy solutions for you.
solFeed: We guide you to reduce waste and manage feeding properly.
solMarket: We buy back at fair price.
solTools: We supply high-quality feeders and drinkers.
solCare: We guide you from Day 1 until you sell back.
agentDesc: No farm needed. No capital needed. No stress. Just share your referral code, connect buyers, and earn attractive rewards on every successful order.
trustDesc: Free booking. Pay on delivery. Instant confirmation. Clear communication. Real poultry business. No hidden stories.
footerSlogan: Simple poultry business. Real domestic earning opportunity.
sellToUsDesc: Have mature birds ready? No buyer? Need fast cash? We buy at a good price. Contact us directly. Fast response. No long story.
searchPlaceholder: Search by phone number or ID...
accessDeniedAdmin: You do not have permission to access the admin dashboard.
accessDeniedCEO: Only CEO accounts can manage system-wide users.
accessDeniedAgent: You must be a registered partner to access this portal.
errorFetchingBookings: There was a problem loading the bookings list.
manageProductsDesc: Update your catalog of birds and prices.
productCatalogSubtitle: Manage your available birds and prices.
noProductsFoundDesc: Start by adding your first poultry product.
seedingProductsDesc: Demo products are being added to your catalog.
seedingFailedDesc: Could not add demo products. Check console.
editProductDesc: Update the details for this poultry item.
addProductDesc: Fill in the details for the new product.
inactiveProductsDesc: Inactive products will not be visible to customers.
noOtherUsersFoundDesc: Other registered users will appear here.
userStatusUpdated: The user's account status has been updated.
referralLinkDesc: Share this link with customers. When they book, you earn rewards.
errorLoadingAgentData: We couldn't load your partner profile.
confirmationSubtitle: Your booking is confirmed. We will call you within seconds.
confirmationDesc: A confirmation sako has been sent to: {phone}.
bookingStep1Subtitle: Select the type of chicken you want to rear.
noProductsForBookingDesc: Check back later or contact us directly.
bookingStep2Subtitle: Select the quantity you want to book.
bookingStep3Subtitle: Tell us who you are so we can call you.
phoneNumberDesc: We will call this number within seconds of booking.
bookingStep4Subtitle: Check your details before completing free booking.
importantHowItWorksDesc: No initial payment required. Pay only on delivery at the nearest agent point.
loginSubtitle: Log in to manage your orders or your partner portal.
loginForTestingDesc: If you don't have an account, please Sign Up first.
signupSubtitle: Join AFDEC and start your domestic earning journey.
creatingDemoAccountsDesc: Use these emails to test different roles:
statusUpdatedAndCommissionDesc: Order completed. {amount} added to partner balance.
noBookingFee: No booking fee. No fear. No pressure.
seriousBuyerDesc: We confirm you are ready and serious before allocation.
payOnDeliveryDesc: Receive your chicks and pay immediately at the agent point.
noFarmNeeded: No farm needed. No capital needed.
shareReferralCode: Just share your referral code and earn rewards.
noHiddenStory: No hidden story. Grow with us.
